data.message: For what purpose? Hip millennials to show how funky-fresh-reto-kitch they are? For posterity, because who the fuck has a tape player anymore? - I'll just get my walkman out and... oh that's right my walkman died in the mid '90s, along with Hip Hop. Leave your albumn where it belongs, as a CD stuck in some bunky old CD stacker, in the boot of someones car.

replies.message: You can buy a new Walkman at Good Will for about three-fiddy.
Austen Gallant exactly lol
Austen Gallant His last name fits his comment, too. Though I disagree about the kill yourself part. The rest, I agree with!

Oh bullshit. Who gives a shit about profile pictures. Mine is of my dog. Rather than give him shit for having an opinion, how about you bring a valid argument to the table in favor of cassettes. Austen Gallant I have a feeling you grew up with CDs more than with tapes. You going to revert to VHS as well? A return to vinyl makes more sense. Tapes were an annoying mistake, a moment in time until CD technology made its appearance. Danielle Sage  there's nothing gallant about his message. :p
We get it, you don't like hip hop on cassettes. So don't waste your time and take your high and mighty opinion attitude because none of us fucking care.
Someone's on her period.  😲😲😲
My tape deck is ready & waiting mf's !!! 😉
you'd be surprised how many people still use audio cassettes. I manufacture hundreds every day going all over the world, blanks and duplicated

Clare Dev my car has a tape player. Excited to grab a copy and blast it.

Danny McWilliams You and all the other salty cry babies care enough to respond without adding to, or creating a discourse. Bitches be like; "you're so vain, you probably think this song is about you". Banal, trite insults regarding my name are juvenile attempts to veil your own inadequacies, and anyone who has an opinion contrary to the herd is a whinger, not simply someone who can have their own fully formed opinion. Here's my turn to be a lonely keyboard hero - Sad pathetic basement trolls that still suckle from mums teat, too poor to afford a new stereo system, probably responding from $50 pre-paid mobiles, connected to MacDonalds free wi-fi, you've hurt me to my core. Mission accomplished, I'm now going to end my life as it has been suggested. I simply cannot go on, knowing I'm a 'Downie' (because Downs syndrome, haha it's funny - like Tyler Perry movies) I totally chose my name too. Well bah bah you sheep have you any wool? Yes sir, yes sir, It's pulled over my eyes. Trump loving seppos.
Trish VC Holy baby jeebus! How did a reasonable person with a sensible response find their way to facebook? You're a gem!
